resources.string:
To properly calibrate pH probe follow instruction below: 

 1. Please insert pH probe to low sol calibration buffer liquid 
 2. Select proper value of low sol calibration buffer liquid 
 3. Press done

To properly calibrate pH probe follow instruction below: 

 1. Please insert pH probe to high sol calibration buffer liquid 
 2. Select proper value of low sol calibration buffer liquid 
 3. Press done
